reviews.review_msg: The course is easy but the lectures are unorganized and most of the time not about info you need to know. He is very knowledgable and interesting but lectures lack organization and meaning.

She is a great prof in lectures! She is funny, interesting and you will never be bored in her course. She shows videos like Tupac's Resurrection, Scarface and The Godfather. However, she is a extremely hard marker on exams. Her study guide tell you exactly what to study but the way she marks is against how others in the class answers the questions.

Wasn't that bad. Weekly quiz and discussions which are easy marks. Assignments are two case studies on a serial killer which are actually fun to write. Not difficult if you put in the effort. Overall I found the course extremely disorganized though, but a good option if you need CRIM 103
I took this course via distance ed and it wasn't too bad. Read the textbook and you'll do fine. 2 papers for 50% of the grade, online quizzes every week and a lot of online discussions.

distance ed course. DO NOT TAKE. TM marked papers really difficult, and didn't respond to any questions I had. Terrible TM, and terrible prof (i tried to email him, also no response). Do not take this class via DE. take it at campus

I enrolled in the distance ed version of this "death by a thousand assignments" style course that included weekly quizzes and online group discussions. I never actually dealt w/ the prof, but the course itself required an unreasonable amount of commitment. I would spend more time on this course than my 2 lab courses combined. Would not recommend

Took by distance learning. A haphazard class with too much going on (weekly quiz, weekly forum participation etc). The marking was quite severe for the papers and you don't get to choose your topic, it is chosen for you and it's a pretty obscure figure. The book is very interesting but the final was full of odd questions. Hard to pin down.

worst dis. ed. course ever. do not take it, the essays are stupid and you're NOT told how exactly you are suppose to analyze the criminal. horrible TA, Courtenay. bad course in general and there is no instructions on how to best study for the final, it's "make your own notes", stupid rite? Hell yes! DO NOT take it, definitely a GPA PLUNGER! no joke

Course itself was very interesting, prof is a good lecturer, midterm was difficult, does not help you prepare for it and final was worse. Not an easy course, to get a good mark you need independent self directed learning because he doesn't help very much.

He is an amazing scholar! One of the most intelligent people i've ever met. BRILLIANT PROF. I love his lectures, it's definitely worth listening to the recorded lectures a second time if you want to get an A. I admire his work. However, the downfall is that we did not receive a textbook, koz he is still editing it. still did well. Take the course!

Funny guy, but a hard class. Study for the midterm because its fair. The final is difficult and a lot of the content isn't really covered so beef up your mark earlier in the semester. The class is scaled so the more you study, the better you'll do

Lectures are disorganized and content is scattered. However exams are mostly on his lectures so you NEED to pay attention and try to take notes. Overall not a hard course, your grade will reflect the work you put into it. Keep up with the readings and participate in tutorial and your presentation and you'll do fine.
what a joke of a prof he was completely useless

Tells interesting stories but is scattered and all over the place. Make sure u keep up w/ the textbook readings cuz if u dont ull be screwed come exam time. The midterm is easy and completely based on lecture notes. Make sure u do well on it b/c the final exam is HARD! Overall, funny and interestin prof but also super vague and at times frustrating

Nice and funny guy. His lecture material and the books are your best friends in this class. MUST read the chapters and know his lecture very well. Make sure you attend every tutorial and participate and do a good job on the presentation as they are worth 30%. Final is do-able as long as you study everything from the beginning to the end.

This course is useless. The exams are so hard. For the mid-term, it's 3 essay questions. Gives you two mandatory and 1 not. No point in studying for this course, you can study for hours and not know a thing. Do not take this course with Ehor, TAs are useless as well.

Extremely difficult to understand. Goes on random tangents which you think are useless but are very important. I got a good grade expecting the worst after reading this but honestly its not that hard. Titi marks EASY. The rest of the whiners are honestly straight dumb. Put in some effort, pay attention, go to class (MUST), and study.

The final was brutal. I'm a 4th year student with a 3.8 GPA....I studied the textbook inside out but it was a waste of time. The final did not test your knowlege or award those who studied. Watch out! The lectures were awesome. The prof was very entertaining, and you do learn a lot....just watch out for the final, it was a joke!

He's not as bad everyone says he is. He's an interesting lecturer but he doesn't stay on topic 75% of the time. His exams aren't as difficult as everyone says it is. Obviously ppl who took this class didn't invest their time into reading the text or attend lectures. If you plan to major in Crim, you'll just have to bare and grin this class.

Holy Wow this class was hard. The material is very interesting and tutorials were entertaining.The Lectures were good and he's a funny guy, but wow the Final was an assault on the mind. The papers and smaller assignments are fair and decent. The Final...oh boy, all multiple choice and it made me wish it was 5 essay's instead. Studying isn't enough
hard

I learned EVERYTHING from my TA. Her name is Jennifer. SHe is superb and precise with her teaching. Boyanowski is horrible. He may have a sense of humour, but when it comes to the midterm and final, WATCH OUT! The final made absolutely no sense.

Prof-->out of his mind! Nobody can follow his lecture; even when I listened to it at home, it made no sense!! He jumps from one topic to another without clarification! Terrible prof! Very surprising that he is still teaching considering all the bad reviews! For the final, you have to study about 500 pages of txt book + notes! It's a 1st yr course!!

Don't bother attending lectures. He goes too fast for anyone to follow. Just listen to the online lectures. Midterm was ALL from the text and final was relevant to NOTHING.  Seriously, everyone finished within one hour just checking any MC.  Final advice: AVOID AT ALL TIMES. Think ur up for challenge? Think again. I thought i was...horribly regret.

HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE!!!! i cannot stress enough... DO NOT TAKE HIM! His writing and his notes are a mess. He does not lecture out the text whatsoever. Exams are hard. Lectures are torture. Good luck staying awake. Better yet, good luck trying to follow his lecture. They are the most unorganized things I've ever seen in my life. boooooooo!

Interesting? Yes. Relevant? No. Seems to enjoy talking about sex &****. Tells lots of stories. Final has nothing to do with anything. Difficult to get a good mark when you don't know what to study for. Oh Ehor, you devil, you.

The course was not "hard". He was just sooooo bad. I CANNOT STRESS ENOUGH DO NOT TAKE THIS TEACHER.1)irrelevant lecture 2)test is very difficult 3)text is AMERICAN (we are in CANADA). 4)the book had a lot of USA info, but there is NO direction to the class 5)the TA should of taught it 6)He pulled questions out of a hat/@$$. 7)****/**** 8), 9)..

Absolute bore to sit in class and you don't learn anything.  He rambles on thinking he has some flow and point to his lecture.  Do your readings.  Midterm wasn't that easy.  It consisted of 3 questions worth 10 marks each.

He doesn't lecture from the book. Midterms have nothing to do with book. EVerything to do with his lectures. Doesn't give notes, talks fast. Worst prof I ever had! Take the course in the summer when other profs teach it....he's a waste of time and money.

He really enjoys telling stories..seriously...he doesn't go through the text stuff...so..beware! If it's a requirement, my advice is to suck it up and sit through his 2 hour lecture and listen to him blab on and on about off-topic material. Lectures are worth 50% about the material though...
No Comments
soooooo boring. I could NOT follow his lectures.
No Comments
Make sure you go to all your tutorials and participate because you will NEED that easy 30%. Midterm is alright if you put some time into it, expect to do poorly on the final.
No Comments

Worst prof ever! Rambles on. His lectures are impossible to follow. Studying is useless, especially for the final. There were questions on the final that were from chapters we were not assigned to read. Avoid this class at all costs. You will not end up learning anything interesting - the course desciption is completely misleading.

Worst class I have ever taken. Studying for the exams in this course is useless. His lectures are two hours of sex jokes. No course material is taught in class. Do not take this class unless you feel like wasting your time and money.

Boyanowsky's lectures are disorganized and confusing.  He rambles on and on about random irrelevant stuff, will briefly mention a study (or start talking about it then go off on a 20 miunte tanget) and then ask ridiculously specific questions on it (80 MC final). The midterm is hard but doable, if you read the text, but the final is IMPOSSIBLE!!!!!

Do NOT take his 103 class. He talks about irrelevant info the whole lecture and has the WORST notes I've ever seen (nothing's on webct). His tests are unpredictable and based on ramblings from his lecture that few understood. Do yourself a favour and stay out of his lecture!!

terrible! His lecture SUX: unorganized and unclear. He jumps around and you dont even know here he's at! No pt at all going to his lecture... He seems not willing to help his students; he gets annoyed if you ask him more than 1 question. There's nothing wrong if you treat this class as a distant class coz you only need to read the text.

HARD HARD HARD! Midterm is hard with NO review and nobody knows what to expect. FINAL is CUMMULATIVE with 80M/C questions... IMPOSSIBLE! lectures are everywhere, very little teaching. You'll spend your life reading while in this class. in one word his class is... IMPOSSIBLE

course material is interesting, but his lectures are all over the place. Spends half the lecture lecturing on irrelvant stuff. Read the text and you'll do well on the midterm. The final however is pointless to study for. It was so difficult and stuff that you probably havent heard of will show up on it.
Great class if you're only looking for entertainment and not great for the content. He would do so much better if he related his stories to the content of the course and did something for Web CT.
No Comments
No Comments

he rambles on in class about nothing, he's ****, and he is very unorganized.  He makes fun of students and tends to pick on them in lecture in front of everyone.  He treats people with little respect and his final exam is nothing like his midterm and studying doesn't help at all for the final.  I passed the course with a B.  He is a sucky prof!!!

Dr. Boyanowsky's class is in fact one of the easiest classes EVER! He spends about 50 mins talking about relevant material and the other 50 mins talking about his ex-wife annoyances, his kids, cookies, England and SEX,SEX,SEX,SEX. And strangely, has THE MOST attractive T.A's on campus. I find him irritating at times, but entertaining!

I know he is unorganized but come on people, other than that the course was easy. JUST READ THE TEXT BOOK! theres no way you can do bad on the exams. It is an interesting course although Boyanowsky has some cons. I recommend it if you need it as a requirement or even as a simple elective

He tries to be too funny, very disorganized, but a nice guy though. If you read the text book you should be able to do pretty good on the exams. Very intestesting course content. Midterms is all written, pretty straight forward, easy. Final is tough, m/c are tricky. Overall is a pretty decent course

I, being a male, didn't mind him, altough he is rather crass, and many stories are overtly sexual.  Always has gorgeous TAs.  Is a bit of a chauvinist from what I gather.  The stories are good and probably true, but extremly tangential.
No Comments
No Comments
He may be a bit disorganized but he is extremely intelligent in this area. Yes he may have some bad jokes, but come on, does nobody have a sense of humor any more?
No Comments
His lectures are all over the place. He is funny, and tries to make the lectures fun, which is a plus. I wouldnt depend on his lectures for the exam though
he tries to be funny and uses wierd voices and waits by saying, "um.. ok." to see if the class laughs at his stupid jokes. lectures are all about case studies, not relevant to whats on exam.

He's the most disorganized prof ever! Always late, puts up one slide for the class and basically digresses from there for 1 1/2 hrs. Tells u all these sexual stories & doesn't cover wut he is supposed to. Midterm was a breeze though if u studied the TEXTBOOK~ just rememb the big names and theories!
Has some funny stories, but lectures can be long. He is not bad, not great, could have better notes, but the book has everything you need.

Worst prof ever!! unfair exams!! ruined my interest for crim!!! leaves cell phone on in class!! we dont give a damn about his stocks!! and his girlfriend he mentions over and over again....Learn how to use to freaken lights! and get new overheads, the ones that he has are from 20+ years ago....

He is a very random person, he jumps all over the place....his stories are funny (although he talks about maturbation alot...)Course material is interesting.....Alot of the exam inforation is in the text!
Fantastic class one of the best offered
one of the worst prof I ever had, I can't believe he's still teaching at SFU! SHould had been fired a long time ago.  He doesn't exam on lecture materials.
One thing good about him is that he had an interesting sense of humour and he always told stories....at least it kept me awake during class
my first semester. great prof who makes his stuff understandable
By far this was the best course I've taken on campus. Material is REALLY interesting, exams not too hard, midterm was a breeze!! Definitely worth taking!!

Sadly enough, i looked forward to taking this course and was sadly disappointed by this arrogant, egocentric arse. I have never met anyone that was so full of himself and could talk on and on about nothing (but yet, could not teach what he was supose to).

I took this course after taking two first year intro psych courses, plus a second year course in social psychology. I obtained an A, under an extreme work load.  I sense this professor is stuck in a groove.  Not recommended.

Bad class, bad teacher, I learned nothing from this class that I did not already know before I took it.  LAME.  Total waste of time. I got an A in this class and it is the only reason I am not totally displeased...

horrible horrible class..  the lectures were unclear. For the midterm he told us to study concepts only, and not specifics, so waht does he do? Put a question asking about a specific thing.. almost everyone did bad!!
Good teacher and the subject material wasn't bad.  He was definitely enthusiastic about the subject.  Midterm was hard and the final was tricky. Take some other Crim courses before you take this one.
Ehor was a big tangenter and name dropper, and didn't have very structured lectures.  Besides that, found the class interesting and would gladly take another with him.
Total name-dropper. Wants to be Robert Hare. Bring a pillow.
Not at all helpful and very unclear
Ehor is good times.  The course material was very interesting and he was really enthusiastic about it.  I'd definately take a course with him again.
could u be more clear on your midterm as to what u want done
Interesting class.  He's got some funny stories.  Goes off topic a lot, but that made lectures more enjoyable.  Study a lot for midterm and final.
Very interesting course text he includes with the course (Mass Murderers). Quite funny and very easy course.  Just as long as you show up and pay attention, you can get a good mark.
He was very unclear and very hard.
I dont think there has ever been a man who loves himself as much as this man.
Being in my 3rd year, I found him easy and quite understandable. Just make sure you take notes, and ask questions in tutorials.
Very boring lectures.  Don't waste your time going~!!
No Comments
No Comments
ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ
Smart but don't waste his time
Has excentric ideas, hard to follow his train of thought and take notes.
No Comments
No Comments
energetic, funny,
No Comments
nice guy, funny and fair - has a lot of personal stories (helpful when relevant)
No Comments
No Comments
